<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energizing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1241)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 10

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Due to their connection to the shop’s proprietor, all Pathfinder Society agents have access to the items from Barghest’s Bin_

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto a weapon

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A weapon with this rune can absorb energy damage to empower it.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;   **Trigger** You take acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage;  **Effect** The weapon becomes imbued with the triggering energy type. It deals an additional 1d8 damage of the triggering type until the end of your next turn. As normal, if you use this reaction again during the duration, the damage doesn't combine; instead, change the 1d8 damage to the new triggering type of damage and change the duration to the end of your next turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
